thread.title: Customer carol Baronowski
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Customer carol Baronowski

author: Customer carol Baronowski
title: Customer carol Baronowski
text: I found shower head slightly larger than the original one so as a result it was harder to fit to the connection on the bar on the wall.But so far it works okay but dare not chance taking the shower head out of its holder as I don't know whether I would be able to put it back in.It was put in by my local plumber.
